title: Blue Cheez Dressing [Vegan, Gluten-Free]
directions: Soaking the cashews in water for a few hours will reduce blending time. If you are not using a Vitamix, I highly recommend soaking the cashews so they blend into a smooth and creamy texture.
Place all the ingredients in a Vitamix or other high-powered blender. Blend until smooth and shiny.
Place the mayonnaise, garlic, agave, lemon juice, miso, vinegar, tahini, and salt into a Vitamix or other blender and blend until smooth and creamy.
Pour dressing into a bowl, then add the green onions and crumbled tofu, stirring gently with a spoon.
If you prefer a thinner dressing, simply add nondairy milk or water.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons finely chopped green onions or parsley
¼ cup raw cashews, soaked in water to cover for 2–3 hours, then drained
